[Portrait]Alma
[Dialog]Let me go!{END}

[Portrait]Wiegraf
[Dialog]Isilud, I will secure the monastery.
Take the girl and go.{END}

[Portrait]Isilud
[Dialog]C'mon, no need to struggle!{END}

<Ramza>! Help me!{END}

So, <Ramza> Beoulve[Delay 00] is here.


Do not be deceived by his youth.
He is a worthy foe. Gird yourselves
well for battle!{END}

[Portrait]Wiegraf
[Dialog]Milleuda, you will soon be avenged.{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>
[Dialog]Wiegraf! You live?{END}

[Portrait]Wiegraf
[Dialog]I have lived for this, <Ramza>.
How long has it been since last we met?{END}

Then you were a warrior who fought to
make your dream reality. Now you are only
a thrall of the Church.{END}

What troubled sleep have you known, to speak
of my dreams?

No matter how sweet, a dream left
unrealized must fade into day.

Only with power can dreams be made real!


I see the truth of it now. What good, dreams,
without that power?

You think me a thrall? So be it!


Your envenomed words succor me, for when
at last you yield-as you must-their poison
will consume you!{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>
[Dialog]I pity you, Wiegraf.

Even as a man of broken dreams, you might
still have been remembered fondly.

Your ideas lifted the people, showed them
the cracks in the age-old facade of the
aristocracy.
You acted on your convictions, and so
ennobled those actions!

But what would the people think now?
What would Milleuda and your fallen friends
think of this barter you've struck?
Dreams built on borrowed stone are defiled
before they are made!{END}

[Portrait]Wiegraf
[Dialog]What have you done that did not rely on
the labors of others?
From birth you have wanted for nothing!
You can not know what it is to live the
meager life we do.
Reason may trick you to believe you do,
but your heart can never know!

Harsh is the world in which we live.
Harsher still than you can imagine.

You have neither right nor reason to
pour scorn on me!{END}

[Portrait]Wiegraf
[Dialog]Do not think you've...won!

I hold the Zodiac Stone...Aries. I will not...
fall so...easily!{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>
[Dialog]Damn you, Wiegraf!{END}
